headline: Eastman Chemical (EMN): Net Profit Margin Falls, Challenging Bullish Valuation Narratives
summary: Eastman Chemical (EMN) posted an EPS forecast to grow at 10.9% per year, while revenue is set to expand by 1.5% annually. Both metrics are trailing broader US market averages. Net profit margin fell to 7.7% from last year’s 9.5%, and after five years of 9.2% annualized earnings growth, the latest period saw negative momentum. With valuation metrics like a 9.9x price-to-earnings ratio stacking up attractively against peers, investors may see an opportunity, but concerns about dividend...

headline: Mechanical Recycling of Plastics Market Size | Companies Analysis 2025-2034
summary: The global Mechanical Recycling of Plastics market size is calculated at USD 41.40 billion in 2025 and is expected to surpass around USD 92.86 billion by 2034, growing at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 9.39% over the forecast period 2025 to 2034.
